mapper.select: SELECT cr_id id, cr_company company, cr_hiredate hiredate, cr_leavedate leavedate, cr_lvreason lvreason, cr_post post, cr_dept dept, cr_area area, cr_salary salary, cr_work work mem_id mid FROM hr_career where mem_id = #{mid} ORDER BY cr_id DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE hr_career SET cr_company = #{company}, cr_hiredate = #{hiredate}, cr_leavedate = #{leavedate}, cr_lvreason = ##{lvreason}, cr_post = #{post}, cr_dept = #{dept}, cr_area = #{area}, cr_salary = #{salary}, cr_work = #{work} WHERE mem_id = #{mid} and cr_id = #{id}
